snippet: John Geddert and London Olympic gymnastics favorite Jordyn Wieber have been training together for more than a decade. And now he's going to be the head coach of the U.S. Olympic women's team.
abstract: John Geddert and London Olympic gymnastics favorite Jordyn Wieber have been training together for more than a decade. And now he's going to be the head coach of the U.S. Olympic women's team.

headline.main: Wieber's Coach to Head U.S. Olympic Gymnastics Team
